select * from pay_accounting_detail d where 1 = 1
and d.verify_status = #{verifyStatus}
mapper.update: update pay_accounting_detail set third_party_verify_status = 1, third_party_verify_time = now() where order_no = #{orderNo}

update d set d.verify_status = h.verify_status, d.verify_code = h.verify_code, d.verify_time = h.operated_time, d.operated_time = h.operated_time, d.operated_by = h.operated_by, d.operated_by_name = h.operated_by_name from pay_accounting_detail d, pay_verify_history h where d.verify_status <> 1 and d.third_party_verify_status = 1 and d.order_complete_status = 1 and h.verify_code = #{verifyCode} and d.store_id = #{storeId} and d.recorded_time < date_add(date_format(#{dateBefore}, '%Y-%m-%d'), interval 1 day)

update d set d.verify_status = h.verify_status, d.verify_code = h.verify_code, d.verify_time = h.operated_time, d.operated_time = h.operated_time, d.operated_by = h.operated_by, d.operated_by_name = h.operated_by_name from pay_accounting_detail d, pay_verify_history h where d.verify_status <> 1 and d.third_party_verify_status = 1 and d.order_complete_status = 1 and h.verify_code = #{verifyCode} and d.id in #{item}
